To access your location, the application requires Approximate Location permission
To access your precise location, the application requires Exact Location permission
To access to microphone, application requires Record Audio permission
To login, application requires Get Accounts permission
To pick a number from your contacts, the application requires Read Contacts permission
To Read events from your Calendar, the application requires Read Calendar permission
To Write events to your Calendar, the application requires Write to Calendar permission
To access files on your device, the application requires Read memory card permission
To write backup files on your device, the application requires Write to a memory card permission

You need to allow background location to notify the application when you will be near the selected location.\nThis app collects location data to enable reminders by location even when the app is closed or not in use.\nLocation data is accessed only where there is at least one active location reminder.
To show notification in Status Bar application requires Notification permission
To make the auto call when a reminder emits application requires this permission
To allow the application to be fully functional, it requires Foreground Service permission

- Additional Reminder type - Custom, with the possibility to set own recurrence rules

Please, correct Until parameter seems it is wrong!
Write BYDAY value according to RFC 5545 specification.\nComma separated values: MO,TU,WE,TH,FR,SA,SU with optional +-(n) prefix
Monthly on the first Friday for 10 occurrences
Every other month on the first and last Sunday of the month for 10 occurrences
Monthly on the second-to-last Monday of the month for 6 months
Monthly on the third-to-the-last day of the month
Monthly on the 2nd and 15th of the month for 10 occurrences
Monthly on the first and last day of the month for 10 occurrences
Every 18 months on the 10th through 15th of the month for 10 occurrences
Yearly in June and July for 10 occurrences
Every other year on January, February, and March for 10 occurrences
Every Thursday, but only during June, July, and August
The first Saturday that follows the first Sunday of the month
Every hour and a half for 4 occurrences
The third instance into the month of one of Tuesday, Wednesday, or Thursday, for the next 3 months
The second-to-last weekday of the month
Weekly on Tuesday and Thursday for five weeks
Every other week on Tuesday and Thursday, for 8 occurrences

Set time of beginning of location tracking
The Start Date property specified within the iCalendar object defines the DATE of the first instance of the recurrence
The Start Time property specified within the iCalendar object defines the TIME of the first instance of the recurrence
If the value specified by UNTIL DATE is synchronized with the specified recurrence, this DATE becomes the last instance of the recurrence
If the value specified by UNTIL TIME is synchronized with the specified recurrence, this TIME becomes the last instance of the recurrence
The WKST rule part specifies the day on which the workweek starts
The BYSETPOS rule part specifies a COMMA-separated list of values that corresponds to the nth occurrence within the set of recurrence instances specified by the rule
The BYWEEKNO rule part specifies a COMMA-separated list of ordinals specifying weeks of the year
The BYYEARDAY rule part specifies a COMMA-separated list of days of the year
The BYMINUTE rule part specifies a COMMA-separated list of minutes within an hour
The BYHOUR rule part specifies a COMMA-separated list of hours of the day
The BYMONTH rule part specifies a COMMA-separated list of months of the year
The BYDAY rule part specifies a COMMA-separated list of days of the week
The BYMONTHDAY rule part specifies a COMMA-separated list of days of the month
The COUNT rule part defines the number of occurrences at which to range-bound the recurrence
The INTERVAL rule part contains a positive integer representing at which intervals the recurrence rule repeats
The Frequency rule part identifies the type of recurrence rule. This rule part MUST be specified in the recurrence rule
Start building your Reminder by adding elements to it
